Package spoon.reflect.cu

Interface CompilationUnit

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, CtCompilationUnit, CtElement, CtQueryable, CtVisitable, FactoryAccessor, Serializable, SourcePositionHolder
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompilationUnitImpl, NoSourcePosition.NullCompilationUnit
@Deprecated public interface CompilationUnit extends CtCompilationUnit
Deprecated.
Defines a compilation unit. In Java, a compilation unit can contain only one public type declaration and other secondary types declarations (not public).
